messages.title: Standing up for local people
messages.content: "Andy is a very strong voice for Rugby. He's always available to help, and he doesn't stop until he gets results." - Richard Clarke (pictured) Admirals, Rugby.

mentions.candidate: Andy is a very strong voice for Rugby.

issues.health: Car parking charges at hospitals are an absolute disgrace.

endorsements.endorsement: Andy is a very strong voice for Rugby. He's always available to help, and he doesn't stop until he gets results.
Car parking charges at hospitals are an absolute disgrace. Congratulations to you and Unison. Keep up the good work. Thank you.
